original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Anumānapañha
analyzed: anumāna pañha

original: Buddhavagga
analyzed: buddha vagga

original: 1 Dvinnaṁbuddhānaṁanuppajjamānapañha
analyzed: dvinna buddha anuppajjamāna pañha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, bhāsitampetaṁ bhagavatā—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena bhāsitam petam bhagavatā

original: ‘aṭṭhānametaṁ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṁ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā apubbaṁ acarimaṁ uppajjeyyuṁ, netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī’ti.
analyzed: aṭṭhānam eta bhikkhave anavakāsaḥ yat ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahantaḥ sammāsambuddhāḥ apubbam acarimam uppajjeyyu na etam ṭhānam vijjati iti

original: Desentā ca, bhante nāgasena, sabbepi tathāgatā sattatiṁsa bodhipakkhiyadhamme desenti,
analyzed: desentā ca bhante nāgasena sabbe api tathāgatā sattatisa bodhipakkhiya dhamme desenti

original: kathayamānā ca cattāri ariyasaccāni kathenti, sikkhāpentā ca tīsu sikkhāsu sikkhāpenti,
analyzed: kathayamānā ca cattāri ariya saccāni kathenti sikkhāpentā ca tīsu sikkhāsu sikkhāpenti

original: anusāsamānā ca appamādappaṭipattiyaṁ anusāsanti.
analyzed: anusāsamānā ca appamāda paṭipattiyam anusāsanti

original: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, sabbesampi tathāgatānaṁ ekā desanā ekā kathā ekā sikkhā ekā anusiṭṭhi, kena kāraṇena dve tathāgatā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti?
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena sabbesam pi tathāgatānam ekā desanā ekā kathā ekā sikkhā ekā anusiṭṭhi kena kāraṇena dve tathāgatāḥ eka khaṇe nu pajjanti

original: Ekenapi tāva buddhuppādena ayaṁ loko obhāsajāto, yadi dutiyo buddho bhaveyya, dvinnaṁ
analyzed: ekena api tāva buddha uppādena ayam lokaḥ obhāsa jātaḥ yadi dutiyaḥ buddhaḥ bhaveyya

original: pabhāya ayaṁ loko bhiyyoso mattāya obhāsajāto bhaveyya, ovadamānā ca dve tathāgatā
analyzed: pabhāya ayam lokaḥ bhiyyosaḥ mattāya obhāsa jātaḥ bhaveyya ovadamānā ca dve tathāgatā

original: sukhaṁ ovadeyyuṁ, anusāsamānā ca sukhaṁ anusāseyyuṁ, tattha me kāraṇaṁ brūhi, yathāhaṁ
analyzed: sukham ovadeyyu anusāsamānā ca sukham anusāseyyu tattha me kāraṇam brūhi yathā āha

original: nissaṁsayo bhaveyyan”ti.
analyzed: nissasayaḥ

original: “Ayaṁ, mahārāja, dasasahassī lokadhātu ekabuddhadhāraṇī, ekasseva tathāgatassa guṇaṁ
analyzed: aya mahā rāja dasa sahassī lokadhātu eka buddha dhāraṇī ekassa iva tathāgatassa guṇa

original: dhāreti, yadi dutiyo buddho uppajjeyya, nāyaṁ dasasahassī lokadhātu dhāreyya, caleyya
analyzed: dhāreti yadi dutiyaḥ buddhaḥ uppajjeyya na ayam dasa sahassī lokadhātu dhāreyya caleyya

original: kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya vikireyya vidhameyya viddhaṁseyya, na ṭhānamupagaccheyya.
analyzed: kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya vikireyya vidhameyya viddhaseyya na ṭhānam upagaccheyya

original: Yathā, mahārāja, nāvā ekapurisasandhāraṇī bhaveyya, ekasmiṁ purise abhirūḷhe sā nāvā samupādikā bhaveyya.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja nāvā eka purisa sandhāraṇī bhaveyya ekasmin purise abhirūḍhe sā nāvā samupādikā bhaveyya

original: Atha dutiyo puriso āgaccheyya tādiso āyunā vaṇṇena vayena pamāṇena kisathūlena sabbaṅgapaccaṅgena, so taṁ nāvaṁ abhirūheyya, api nu sā, mahārāja, nāvā dvinnampi dhāreyyā”ti?
analyzed: atha dutiyaḥ purisaḥ āgaccheyya tādisaḥ āyunā vaṇṇena vayena pamāṇena kisathūlena sabbaṅga paccaṅgena saḥ tam nāvam abhirūheyya api nu sā mahā rāja nāvā dvinnam api dhāreyya ati

original: “Na hi, bhante, caleyya kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya vikireyya vidhameyya viddhaṁseyya, na ṭhānamupagaccheyya, osīdeyya udake”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhante caleyya kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya vikireyya vidhameyya viddhaseyya na ṭhānam upagaccheyya osīdeyya udaka iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, ayaṁ dasasahassī lokadhātu ekabuddhadhāraṇī, ekasseva tathāgatassa
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ayam dasa sahassī lokadhātu eka buddha dhāraṇī ekassa iva tathāgatassa

original: guṇaṁ dhāreti, yadi dutiyo buddho uppajjeyya, nāyaṁ dasasahassī lokadhātu dhāreyya,
analyzed: guṇam dhāreti yadi dutiyaḥ buddhaḥ uppajjeyya na ayam dasa sahassī lokadhātu dhāreyya

original: caleyya kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya vikireyya vidhameyya viddhaṁseyya, na ṭhānamupagaccheyya.
analyzed: caleyya kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya vikireyya vidhameyya viddhaseyya na ṭhānam upagaccheyya

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, puriso yāvadatthaṁ bhojanaṁ bhuñjeyya chādentaṁ yāva kaṇṭhamabhipūrayitvā,
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja purisaḥ yāvadattham bhojanam bhuñjeyya chādentam yāva kaṇṭham abhipūrayitvā

original: so dhāto pīṇito paripuṇṇo nirantaro tandikato anonamitadaṇḍajāto punadeva tattakaṁ
analyzed: saḥ dhāto pīṇitaḥ paripuṇṇaḥ nirantaraḥ tandikataḥ anonamita daṇḍa jātaḥ punar eva

original: bhojanaṁ bhuñjeyya, api nu kho so, mahārāja, puriso sukhito bhaveyyā”ti?
analyzed: bhojanam bhuñjeyya api nu kho saḥ mahā rāja purisaḥ sukhitaḥ bhaveyya ati

original: “Na hi, bhante, sakiṁ bhuttova mareyyā”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhante sakim bhuttaḥ uva mareyya ati

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, ayaṁ dasasahassī lokadhātu ekabuddhadhāraṇī, ekasseva tathāgatassa
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ayam dasa sahassī lokadhātu eka buddha dhāraṇī ekassa iva tathāgatassa

original: guṇaṁ dhāreti, yadi dutiyo buddho uppajjeyya, nāyaṁ dasasahassī lokadhātu dhāreyya,
analyzed: guṇam dhāreti yadi dutiyaḥ buddhaḥ uppajjeyya na ayam dasa sahassī lokadhātu dhāreyya

original: caleyya kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya vikireyya vidhameyya viddhaṁseyya, na
analyzed: caleyya kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya vikireyya vidhameyya viddhaseyya na

original: ṭhānamupagaccheyyā”ti.
analyzed: ṭhānam upagaccheyya iti

original: “Kiṁ nu kho, bhante nāgasena, atidhammabhārena pathavī calatī”ti?
analyzed: kim nu kho bhante nāgasena ati dhamma bhārena pathavī calati iti

original: “Idha, mahārāja, dve sakaṭā ratanaparipūritā bhaveyyuṁ yāva mukhasamā, ekasmā sakaṭato
analyzed: mahā rāja dve sakaṭāḥ ratana paripūritāḥ bhaveyyum yāva mukha samāḥ ekasmai sakaṭataḥ

original: ratanaṁ gahetvā ekasmiṁ sakaṭe ākireyyuṁ, api nu kho taṁ, mahārāja, sakaṭaṁ dvinnampi
analyzed: ratanam gahetvā ekasmin sakaṭe ākireyyuḥ api nu khalu te mahā rāja sakaṭam dvinnam pi

original: sakaṭānaṁ ratanaṁ dhāreyyā”ti?
analyzed: sakaṭānam ratanam dhāreyyā ati

original: “Na hi, bhante, nābhipi tassa phaleyya, arāpi tassa bhijjeyyuṁ, nemipi tassa opateyya, akkhopi tassa bhijjeyyā”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhante nābhi pi tassa phaleyya arāpi tassa bhijjeyyu nemi pi tassa akkhopi tassa bhijjeyya ati

original: “Kiṁ nu kho, mahārāja, atiratanabhārena sakaṭaṁ bhijjatī”ti?
analyzed: kim nu khalu mahā rāja ati ratana bhārena sakaṭam bhijjati iti

original: “Āma, bhante”ti.
analyzed: āma bhanta iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, atidhammabhārena pathavī calati.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ati dhamma bhārena pathavī calati

original: Api ca, mahārāja, imaṁ kāraṇaṁ buddhabalaparidīpanāya osāritaṁ.
analyzed: api ca mahā rāja imam kāraṇam buddha bala paridīpanāya osārita

original: Aññampi tattha abhirūpaṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi, yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti.
analyzed: aññam pi tattha abhirūpam kāraṇam suṇohi yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhāḥ eka khaṇe na uppajjanti

original: Yadi, mahārāja, dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe uppajjeyyuṁ, tesaṁ parisāya vivādo uppajjeyya
analyzed: yadi mahā rāja dve sammāsambuddhāḥ eka kkhaṇe uppajjeyyu tesam parisāya vivādaḥ uppajjeyya

original: ‘tumhākaṁ buddho, amhākaṁ buddho’ti, ubhato pakkhajātā bhaveyyuṁ, yathā, mahārāja,
analyzed: tumhākam buddhaḥ amhākam buddhaḥ iti ubhatas pakkhajātāḥ bhaveyyu yathā mahā rāja

original: dvinnaṁ balavāmaccānaṁ parisāya vivādo uppajjeyya ‘tumhākaṁ amacco, amhākaṁ amacco’ti,
analyzed: dvinnam balavā amaccānam parisāya vivādaḥ uppajjeyya tumhākam amaccaḥ amhākam amaccaḥ iti

original: ubhato pakkhajātā honti;
analyzed: ubhatas pakkhajātāḥ honti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yadi dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe uppajjeyyuṁ, tesaṁ parisāya vivādo uppajjeyya ‘tumhākaṁ buddho, amhākaṁ buddho’ti, ubhato pakkhajātā bhaveyyuṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yadi dve sammāsambuddhāḥ eka khaṇe uppajjeyyu tesam parisāya vivādaḥ uppajjeyya tumhākam buddhaḥ amhākam buddhaḥ iti ubhatas pakkha jātāḥ bhaveyyu

original: Idaṁ tāva, mahārāja, ekaṁ kāraṇaṁ, yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti.
analyzed: idam tāva mahā rāja ekam kāraṇa yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhāḥ eka khaṇe na uppajjanti

original: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi, yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti.
analyzed: aparam pi mahā rāja uttarim kāraṇam suṇohi yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhāḥ eka khaṇe na uppajjanti

original: Yadi, mahārāja, dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe uppajjeyyuṁ, ‘aggo buddho’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ,
analyzed: yadi mahā rāja dve sammāsambuddhāḥ eka kkhaṇe uppajjeyyu aggaḥ buddhaḥ iti yam

original: taṁ micchā bhaveyya, ‘jeṭṭho buddho’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā bhaveyya, ‘seṭṭho
analyzed: tam micchā bhaveyya jeṭṭhaḥ buddho ti yam tam micchā bhaveyya seṭṭhaḥ

original: buddho’ti, ‘visiṭṭho buddho’ti, ‘uttamo buddho’ti, ‘pavaro buddho’ti, ‘asamo buddho’ti,
analyzed: buddho iti visiṭṭhaḥ buddho iti uttamaḥ buddho iti pavaraḥ buddho iti asamaḥ buddho iti

original: ‘asamasamo buddho’ti, ‘appaṭimo buddho’ti, ‘appaṭibhāgo buddho’ti, ‘appaṭipuggalo
analyzed: asamasamaḥ buddho ti appaṭimaḥ buddho ti appaṭibhāgaḥ buddho ti appaṭipuggalo

original: buddho’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā bhaveyya.
analyzed: buddha uti yam tam micchā bhaveyya

original: Idampi kho tvaṁ, mahārāja, kāraṇaṁ atthato sampaṭiccha, yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti.
analyzed: idam api kho tva mahā rāja kāraṇam atthataḥ sampaṭiccha yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhāḥ eka khaṇe na uppajjanti

original: Api ca kho, mahārāja, buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ sabhāvapakati esāyaṁ, ekoyeva buddho loke uppajjati.
analyzed: api ca kho mahā rāja buddhānam bhagavantānam sabhāva pakati esāya ekaḥ yā iva buddhaḥ loke uppajjati

original: Kasmā kāraṇā?
analyzed: kasmai kāraṇā

original: Mahantatāya sabbaññubuddhaguṇānaṁ.
analyzed: mahanta tāya sabbaññu buddha guṇāna

original: Aññampi, mahārāja, yaṁ loke mahantaṁ, taṁ ekaṁyeva hoti.
analyzed: aññam pi mahā rāja yam loke tam ekayā iva hoti

original: Pathavī, mahārāja, mahantī, sā ekā yeva.
analyzed: pathavī mahā rāja mahantī sā ekā yā iva

original: Sāgaro mahanto, so ekoyeva.
analyzed: sāgaraḥ mahantaḥ saḥ

original: Sineru girirājā mahanto, so ekoyeva.
analyzed: sineru giri rājā mahantaḥ

original: Ākāso mahanto, so ekoyeva.
analyzed: ākāsaḥ mahantaḥ saḥ

original: Sakko mahanto, so ekoyeva.
analyzed: sakkaḥ mahantaḥ saḥ

original: Māro mahanto, so ekoyeva.
analyzed: māraḥ mahantaḥ saḥ

original: Mahābrahmā mahanto, so ekoyeva.
analyzed: mahā brahmā mahantaḥ saḥ

original: Tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho mahanto, so eko yeva lokasmiṁ.
analyzed: tathāgataḥ araham sammāsambuddhaḥ mahantaḥ saḥ ekaḥ yā iva lokasmi

original: Yattha te uppajjanti, tattha aññassa okāso na hoti, tasmā, mahārāja, tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho ekoyeva lokasmiṁ uppajjatī”ti.
analyzed: yattha te uppajjanti tattha aññassa okāsaḥ na hoti tasmā mahā rāja tathāgataḥ araham sammāsambuddhaḥ ekaḥ yā iva lokasmin uppajjati iti

original: “Sukathito, bhante nāgasena, pañho opammehi kāraṇehi.
analyzed: su kathitaḥ bhante nāgasena pañhaḥ opammehi kāraṇehi

original: Anipuṇopetaṁ sutvā attamano bhaveyya, kiṁ pana mādiso mahāpañño.
analyzed: a nipuṇa upetam sutvā atta manaḥ bhaveyya kim pana mādisaḥ mahā pañño

original: Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Dvinnaṁ buddhānaṁ anuppajjamānapañho paṭhamo.
analyzed: dvinnam buddhānam anuppajjamānapañhaḥ paṭhamaḥ
